title: Patch Kernel Problems?
body:
Is anyone elses' league patch kernel crashing and won't open properly?
Or if there's a way to fix it without reinstalling League?
I've restarted/shut down/reopened my computer three times now and the kernel won't load up.

replies.body: Go to Local Disk (C) > Riot Games > League of Legends > lol.launcher.admin.
While that starts up League without problems, it doesn't solve it permanently. The kernel error persists if I try launching via the normal shortcut that worked before.

I recommend continuing to run league through the normal patcher, or you might come up with errors.  It sounds like your patcher is trying to launch, but your OS settings or permissions is preventing it and resulting in this kernel error.  I recommend going over the steps in our [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide to grant access for the game to launch.  This should get you fixed up, but let me know if you run into any problems.
